data.title: Censorship
data.solution:
sentence = input().split()
illegal = input().lower().split()
print(*[[word, "*"*len(word)][word.lower() in illegal] for word in sentence])
data.statement:
You must cover all the illegal words (case-insensitive) in a sentence with *.

Only full words should be censored, therefore censoring the word "be" must <<not>> affect the word "behavior".

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn:
I hate when people act so dumb
hatE idiots Dumb dummy

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
Just some test sentence with words
tESt WordS

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn:
This sentence contains no illegal words
drugs guns is murder
testCases.testOut: This sentence contains no illegal words

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
let Consider it One more example
side o
testCases.testOut: let Consider it One more example

testCases.testIn:
help me Stepbrother im stuck stuck
stuck brother

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
Combination from example one and one
nation one

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn:
confusion of the highest order a
off a man fusion the of of

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
Why are you geh
who says im geh geh

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn:
What starts with F and ends with uck Firetruck
Curse Words are and DUmB fIrEtRuCk F
testCases.testOut: What starts with * *** ends with uck *********

data.constraints: The [[sentence]] and illegal [[words]] are made only of letters and spaces.
data.stubGenerator:
read sentence:string(300)
read words:string(300)
write in order to pass this task, you must not forget to *****
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> A string [[sentence]] that must be censored
<<Line 2 :>> A space-separated string of [[words]] to be considered illegal
data.outputDescription: The [[sentence]] with all the illegal words hidden under *

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must cover all the illegal words (case-insensitive) in a sentence with *.

Only full words should be censored, therefore censoring the word "be" must not affect the word "behavior".
Input
Line 1 : A string sentence that must be censored
Line 2 : A space-separated string of words to be considered illegal
Output
The sentence with all the illegal words hidden under *
Constraints
The sentence and illegal words are made only of letters and spaces.
Example
Input
I hate when people act so dumb
hatE idiots Dumb dummy
Output
I **** when people act so ****
